summary: Dangerous radioactive material is used in many medical and industrial applications. But, if it ends up in the wrong hands, it could be used in a dirty bomb. Replacing technologies that use radioactive materials with safer alternatives can protect people and reduce potential financial costs. title: Alternatives to Radioactive Materials: A National Strategy to Support Alternative Technologies May Reduce Risks of a Dirty Bomb
